subject: Cross-Country Skiing
Olympic Games (2014)
Snowboarding
lead_paragraph: Marit Bjorgen became the most decorated female Winter Olympian in history on Saturday, leading a Norwegian sweep in the women’s 30-kilometer cross-country ski race.
snippet: Marit Bjorgen became the most decorated female Winter Olympian in history on Saturday, leading a Norwegian sweep in the women’s 30-kilometer cross-country ski race.
